long_description: This original no jive pocket guide features Cosmic Ray's favorite Phoenix day hikes and high country summer hikes. Author: Cosmic Ray. Softcover; 112 pages; black and white illustrated maps and drawings. Published by Cosmic Ray; copyright 2003. Includes down-to-earth maps, difficulty ratings, cactus guide, heaps of trail nuggets and a Phoenix freeway map.
short_description: This original no jive pocket guide features Cosmic Ray's favorite Phoenix day hikes and high country summer hikes.
